description.selection: A comprehensive full-stack ecommerce store template with customer storefront, admin dashboard, and Cloudflare Workers backend API. Perfect for building any type of online store - fashion, electronics, general retail, or specialized ecommerce applications. Includes product catalog, shopping cart, checkout flow with Stripe integration, order management, payment tracking, and D1 database schema. Built with React 19, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Hono on Cloudflare Workers.
description.usage:
This is the base ecommerce store template. It provides a complete full-stack foundation for building online stores.

**Project Structure:**
```
base-store/
├── src/                    # Customer-facing storefront (main app)
│   ├── App.tsx             # Main app with routing
│   ├── main.tsx            # Entry point
│   ├── index.css           # Global styles (Tailwind)
│   ├── api/                # API client
│   ├── components/         # Reusable components
│   ├── context/            # React context (Cart)
│   └── pages/              # Page components
├── admin-app/              # Admin dashboard (React + Vite)
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── App.tsx
│   │   ├── api/
│   │   ├── components/
│   │   ├── context/
│   │   └── pages/
│   └── [config files]
├── api-worker/             # Cloudflare Workers API (Hono)
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── index.ts        # API entry point
│   │   ├── middleware/     # Auth, store resolver
│   │   ├── routes/         # API routes
│   │   └── types.ts
│   └── wrangler.toml
├── infra/
│   └── db/
│       ├── schema.sql      # D1 database schema
│       └── seed.sql        # Sample data
└── public/                 # Static assets
```

**Storefront Features (Main App):**
- Product catalog with grid views and search
- Shopping cart with local storage persistence
- Product detail pages with add-to-cart
- Checkout process with Stripe integration hooks
- Success/confirmation page
- Responsive design with warm cream palette

**Admin Dashboard Features (admin-app/):**
- Dashboard with key metrics and statistics
- Product management (CRUD operations)
- Order management and tracking
- Payment monitoring
- Dark theme with responsive sidebar

**Edge API Features (api-worker/):**
- RESTful API built with Hono
- Store resolution middleware
- Authentication middleware
- Product, order, and webhook routes
- D1 database integration

**Tech Stack:**
- React 19 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- React Router for navigation
- Hono for API routing
- Cloudflare Workers & D1
- Lucide React for icons

**DO NOT TOUCH FILES:**
- package.json
- vite.config.ts
- tsconfig.json / tsconfig.app.json / tsconfig.node.json
- tailwind.config.js / tailwind.config.cjs
- postcss.config.cjs
- eslint.config.js
- admin-app/[config files]
- api-worker/package.json
- api-worker/wrangler.toml
- infra/db/schema.sql (structure)

**Running Locally:**
```bash
npm install
npm run db:init   # Initialize D1 database
npm run db:seed   # Seed with sample data
npm run dev       # Start storefront (main app)
npm run dev:admin # Start admin dashboard
npm run dev:api   # Start API worker
```

**API Integration:**
Apps use environment variables:
- VITE_API_URL (default: http://localhost:8787)
- VITE_STORE_SLUG (default: demo-store)

**Database:**
D1 schema in infra/db/schema.sql includes:
- stores, products, orders, order_items, payments tables

Customize this template for your specific ecommerce needs.
